name: Outrun Europa
description:
as you pilot a small scouting craft on a routine patrol of the solar system, one of jupiter's moons suddenly breaks orbit and begins to give chase, as though it had a mind of its own. from its whispering voices you know there is only one target it will accept in exchange for your life. can you truly choose to outrun europa?

made in 48h for pizzajam3

music and sfx by hankworx
